thread.title: Larry David As Bernie In The Dem Debate
thread.title_full: Larry David As Bernie In The Dem Debate - Worldnews.com

author: wn.com
title: Larry David As Bernie In The Dem Debate
text: The SNL x CNN mashup you know you wanted. When Larry David fulfilled comedic destiny and played Bernie Sanders on Saturday Night Live last weekend, the world laughed along. But we also all knew, deep down inside, that we wanted something more: We wanted Larry David to actually be in the race, or at least the Democratic debate. So we reached out Dominick Nero, the man who brought you Bern Your Enthusiasm, and commissioned this re-edit of the way, letâ€™s face it, we all wish the race were going.
